overview:
Pete Bernardoni brings 21 years of venture capital experience to Wavepoint and is responsible for managing the firm’s medical technology portfolio. He has been personally involved with investments in more than 30 companies and more than 100 transactions while serving on more than 20 boards of directors.

Prior to Wavepoint, Pete directed a team of investment professionals at Technology Funding, a $315 million family of funds. Pete was responsible for deal flow generation, due diligence, deal structuring, and portfolio company management, taking the lead in the financial analysis of key investment opportunities while maintaining responsibility for ongoing oversight of several portfolio companies in the life sciences and technology sectors.
